files.description: This module provides functionality for preprocessing and normalizing Arabic text. It includes functions to remove diacritics and normalize specific Arabic letters according to certain rules. The module is designed to standardize Arabic text for further processing in NLP or text analysis applications.

functions.name: remove_diacritics
functions.description: Removes all Arabic diacritical marks (tashkeel) from the input text. These marks include fatha, kasra, damma, sukun, shadda, and other vowel marks that appear above or below letters in Arabic script. The function uses regular expressions to identify and remove these marks.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The original Arabic text containing diacritics that need to be removed.

functions.name: normalize_arabic_letters
functions.description: Normalizes specific Arabic letters in the given text according to contextual rules. It specifically handles two cases: 1) Converting the Arabic letter 'ى' (alef maqsura, U+0649) to 'ي' (yeh, U+064A) only when it appears as a standalone word, and 2) Converting the Arabic letter 'ة' (teh marbuta, U+0629) to 'ه' (heh, U+0647) when it appears at the end of words. This normalization helps standardize text variations that are semantically equivalent in Arabic.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The Arabic text to be normalized.

files.description: This module analyzes the Quran text for hidden patterns and anomalies. It contains multiple functions that perform various analyses including numerical pattern detection, word frequency analysis, Arabic root extraction, bigram generation, verse repetition analysis, palindrome detection, Abjad numeral calculation, and semantic symmetry analysis. The module integrates logging and error handling for observability and troubleshooting.

functions.name: analyze_text
functions.description: Analyzes the given text for hidden numerical patterns and anomalies. It simulates detection by returning a list of anomaly messages if the input text is non-empty.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed text of the Quran.

functions.name: analyze_word_frequency
functions.description: Performs word frequency analysis on the preprocessed Quran text. It tokenizes the text, counts word occurrences, prepares a summary of the top words, and flags words with unusually high or low frequencies.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text used for analysis.

functions.name: analyze_root_words
functions.description: Performs Arabic root word analysis on the given Quran text by using a morphological analyzer to extract roots, counting their frequencies, and generating a detailed summary along with the top frequent root words.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text for root extraction.

functions.name: analyze_bigrams
functions.description: Generates n-grams from a list of tokenized words and computes the frequency of each n-gram tuple. Defaults to bigrams if no 'n' is specified.

parameters.name: tokenized_text
parameters.description: A list of preprocessed tokens from the Quran text.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The number of words in each n-gram (default is 2).

functions.name: analyze_verse_repetitions
functions.description: Analyzes verse repetitions within each Surah and across the entire Quran by parsing each line for surah and ayah details, normalizing verses, and identifying repeated verses with detailed metrics.

parameters.name: preprocessed_text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text data where each line represents a verse.

functions.name: analyze_palindromes
functions.description: Detects palindromic words and phrases within each verse of the Quran. It logs detected palindromes and returns a list of tuples indicating the Surah, Ayah, and the detected palindrome.

parameters.name: quran_text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text for palindrome analysis.

functions.name: analyze_abjad_numerals
functions.description: Performs Abjad numeral analysis of the Quran text by calculating the numerical sum of verses based on Arabic letter values. It logs detailed results and returns a list of tuples for verses with notable numerical patterns.

parameters.name: quran_text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text used for Abjad numeral analysis.

functions.name: analyze_semantic_symmetry
functions.description: Analyzes semantic symmetry within each Surah by dividing the text into segments, tokenizing, and calculating the overlap of common words to assess symmetric patterns.

parameters.name: quran_text
parameters.description: The preprocessed Quran text for semantic symmetry analysis.

files.description: Module for logging analysis outputs of the Quran Secrets application. Provides functions to log secret findings, results, and bigram frequencies into a log file with timestamps.

parameters.name: bigram_frequencies
parameters.description: A dictionary mapping bigram tuples to frequency counts.

parameters.name: top_n
parameters.description: The number of top bigrams to log (default is 20).
